column2: Can you say me your name?
column3: Can you tell me your name?
column4: Können Sie sagen mir Ihren Namen?

column2: We need your mail in order to contact you in case we have any further questions.
column3: We need your address in order to contact you in case we have any further questions.
column4: Wir brauchen Ihre Adresse um zu kontaktieren Sie falls wir haben weitere Fragen.

column3: We will see each other next week.
